data.name: TandemTools
data.description: Tool for assessing/improving assembly quality in extra-long tandem repeats

evidence: “TandemTools package includes TandemQUAST tool for evaluating and improving assemblies of extra-long tandem repeats (ETR) and TandemMapper tool for mapping long error-prone reads to ETRs.”
Quick start and usage sections show direct command-line execution: “tandemquast.py [options] …”, “tandemmapper.py [options] …”

Installation is described via requirements.txt and conda, with no mention of package registries or binaries beyond cloning/using the repo: “Requirements are listed in `requirements.txt` and can be installed through Conda as `conda install --file requirements.txt`.”
